## Usage

1. Open App
2. Under settings, import `rose-pine.theme`
3. Select `Ros√© Pine` from the themes dropdown

## Style guide

> Be sure to remove this section üòå

- Lowercase meta files, eg. `readme.md`
- Repo name should be the simplest version of the app name, eg. iterm instead of iTerm2
- Format repo description as "Soho vibes for App"
- Generate and upload social image via [Ros√© Pine Images](https://rose-pine-images.vercel.app)
